summary: If you could change one thing in the Star Wars Prequel Era that only had a knock-on effect on the main characters (ie cant say...
question: If you could change one thing in the Star Wars Prequel Era that only had a knock-on effect on the main characters (ie cant say 'Get Anakin Therapy' or  but 'Free Shmi which might then lead to Anakin getting therapy' is allowed), what would it be?
answer: Anon I think you answered yourself. Another fun option is “Sidious contracts a cureless rare disease”

reblog.comment: Anon I think you answered yourself. Another fun option is “Sidious contracts a cureless rare disease”

summary:
i’ve decided to make a prompt list for inktober 2018 but star wars themed because why not 🤠
if anyone wants to participate, be...
body:
i’ve decided to make a prompt list for inktober 2018 but star wars themed because why not 🤠

if anyone wants to participate, be my guest!! i hope to see some people taking part and if u do, pls tag me (i love seeing all this amazing art) or use the hashtag #hansinktober2018 💓🌈⭐️

summary: For anon...enjoy! You ducked behind some scrap as more bucket-heads ran from the shelter of the main building. Your little area...
caption:
For anon…enjoy!

You ducked behind some scrap as more bucket-heads ran from the shelter of the main building. Your little area was in between them and the open ship you had landed in. Bodhi. You best friend, and admittedly your crush, was still in the ship ready for the get away; you had to protect him.

Taking in a deep breath, you popped back up and starting shooting as much as you could. Several of them fell in quick succession. It had become complete hell down here and you could only hope Jyn and Cassian were making progress.

When that group was down, you hustled over to the open hull. The clang of your body against the metal caused the pilot to jolt. You sent him a smirk as he stared at you with wide eyes.

“What the hell? You’re supposed to be with Chirrut!”
“Ah, he’s got Baze. They’ll be fine,” you paused to start shooting at another troop. “Besides, someone’s gotta guard your sorry ass.”
Bodhi let out a chuckle. “Yeah, thanks for the worry.”

You refocused on the people shooting at you. You watched as comrades died, but you forced yourself to keep going. One with yellow gear caught your eye. They were running toward you, toward Bodhi as he called for help, holding a small container. Your eyes widened.

“Oh hell no.”

With quick succession, you shot their chest, then their hand, and then the flying device. Momentarily, you ducked from the large flaming blast that resulted from it.

Hopping into the ship, you fell to one knee while continuing to shoot. Unbeknownst to you, Bodhi was staring with a gaping jaw. You just saved his life.

“Any chance you can hurry it up, Bo?” you shouted at him.

He refocused.

A loud cheer erupted within the ship as the remaining watched Scarif explode. Somehow your little group of misfits had survived and managed to fly away. Though the loss was heavy, in the moment, everyone only felt relief.

Having turned autopilot on, Bodhi had walked over toward you. He gripped your wrist before kissing your hand.

“Thank you,” he murmured, “for saving my life.”

Blushing, you threw your arms around him and gave him a desperate kiss. Out of surprise, he didn’t respond. He did keep his hold on you. When you pulled back, his gaze was glossed over as he smiled.

“That was…”
“Unexpected,” you offered.
“Amazing,” he finished.

Grinning like an idiot, you ducked your head into his shoulder. He held the embrace, kissing the top of your head. There was loss, but he still had you.

Perma-tags: @beeeeeeeeeeeeeeeep @heeyeonni @caitsymichelle13 @frostbyte-horan @littlestfangirl @bestillmystuckyheart @anali-022506 @krylo-rxn @yllwtaxi @ilovetvshowsblog @mimikyu-of-death @spider-woman22
Semi-tags: @bi-shy-and-ready-to-die @michaelathewordsmith

summary: My Cool Friend That Also Likes Star Wars™️ and I were talking about Episode 8 and what we both thought about it, and she was...
body:
My Cool Friend That Also Likes Star Wars™️ and I were talking about Episode 8 and what we both thought about it, and she was telling me how she thought there was a bit too much implied romance between Kylo and Rey for her taste and that that was never the case in previous Star Wars movies

And I was like

um

uM

Disclaimer: I love my friend, I just couldn‘t believe she thought Rey and Kylo‘s forcetime-sessions were cheesier than edgy Anakin in Episode 2 xD

summary: Nornes
title: Nornes
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2O8D02Z

by amphisbaenawormlizard

Kylo Ren and Rey are Nornes, half supernatural beings of Skywalker line. Their race is ruling the whole of the Galaxy, making other humanoid species their servants and slaves. They are married but it’s mariage blanc, arranged to keep the power and wealth in the family. Besides Nornes can’t have children with the others of their own race and need non-Nornian sexual partners to multiply.

Words: 315, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Star Wars Sequel Trilogy
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Rape/Non-Con
  • Categories: Multi
